title: Sony A1 review: A fast camera in a fast city
description: Sonys top-of-the-line Alpha 1 mirrorless camera checks every spec box and comes with every feature. Its one of the most capable cameras you can buy. We hit up one of NYCs fastest cyclists, Terry Barentsen, to see how well it can keep up under pressure.  If you buy something from a Verge link, Vox Media may earn a commission.
